outputs.output_descr: UNDP CO established partnership with local stakeholders from Montenegro and relevant partners from neighboring countries to work under IPA CBC Component Projects. Two ongoing projects: Development of Outdoor Tourism (MNE-HR) AND Sustainable Tourism for Equal Chances (MNE-SRB), are contributing towards establishing of cross national tourism clusters, including development of new professions, as well as safety standards and capacities strengthening. These cross-border projects will serve as initial points for Dinaric-wide approach, with purpose on establishing of Corridor of Sustainable Development (Via Dinarica/Long Trail). Positive experiences and lessons learned through Hiking&Biking Project in Montenegro will serve as main entry points for regional based development, which should serve for income generating in Dinaric Arc region.

project_descr: Implementation of the part of the Montenegrin Tourism Master Plan 2007-2020: Wilderness Hiking and Biking
